channel.title: Open-Source Observability | SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool to help you find issues in your deployed applications & solve them quickly. It provides logs, metrics, and traces under a single pane of glass. Built with ClickHouse as datastore, it is designed to handle enterprise scale.
channel.item: https://signoz.io/blog/ten-reasons-not-add-observability Ten reasons not to add observability https://signoz.io/blog/ten-reasons-not-add-observability undefined Fri, 22 Sep 2023 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (SigNoz Inc) OpenTelemetryobservabilityjokes
